aliases.title: Aliases
aliases.description: Aliases are alternative identifiers for the user. Use them to reference users by your own IDs (e.g., database ID, username).

push.title: Push Subscription
push.description: The push subscription ID for this device. Used to send targeted push notifications.

emails.title: Email Subscriptions
emails.description: Email addresses associated with this user for email messaging campaigns.

sms.title: SMS Subscriptions
sms.description: Phone numbers associated with this user for SMS messaging.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Key-value data attached to the user for segmentation and personalization.

triggers.title: Triggers
triggers.description: Local triggers that control when in-app messages are displayed.

outcomes.title: Outcomes
outcomes.description: Track user actions and conversions attributed to OneSignal messaging.

inAppMessaging.title: In-App Messaging
inAppMessaging.description: Display rich messages inside your app based on user behavior and segments.

location.title: Location
location.description: Share device location for location-based targeting and analytics.

trackEvent.title: Track Event
trackEvent.description: Track custom events with optional properties for analytics and segmentation.

sendPushNotification.title: Send Push Notification
sendPushNotification.description: Test push notifications by sending them to this device.

options.name: Simple
options.description: Basic push notification with title and body text only.

options.name: With Image
options.description: Push notification with a large image attachment (big picture style).

options.name: Custom
options.description: Create a custom notification with your own title and message content.

sendInAppMessage.title: Send In-App Message
sendInAppMessage.description: Test in-app message display formats. These trigger local IAMs for testing UI layouts.

options.name: Top Banner
options.description: Slides in from the top of the screen. Best for non-intrusive alerts and quick info.

options.name: Bottom Banner
options.description: Slides in from the bottom of the screen. Great for prompts and soft CTAs.

options.name: Center Modal
options.description: Centered popup dialog. Ideal for important announcements requiring user attention.

options.name: Full Screen
options.description: Takes over the entire screen. Best for onboarding, promotions, or rich media content.
